mapper.select: select case (select count(*) from tbl_email a join tbl_member b on a.email = b.fk_email where status = 1 and a.email = #{email} and b.passwd = #{passwd}) when 1 then 1 else (case (select count(*) from tbl_email a join tbl_member b on a.email = b.fk_email where status = 1 and a.email = #{email}) when 1 then 0 else -1 end) end as logincheck from dual

select email, passwd, name, birth, post1, post2, addr1, addr2, to_char(joindate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as joindate, point, status from tbl_email a join tbl_member b on a.email = b.fk_email where status = 1 and a.email = #{email}
